articles.title: Tech Mahindra acquires European tech firm for EUR 310 million - Moneycontrol
articles.description: The acquisition of CTC is the second-largest acquisition that the company has made after scam-hit Satyam in April 2010.
articles.content: IT company Tech Mahindra on Monday announced acquisition of 100 per cent stake in Europe-based Com tec Co IT (CTC) and 25 per cent stake in two IT platforms for a total of EUR 330 million (about Rs 2… [+655 chars]

articles.title: Castlebar's status as the 'luckiest town in Europe' continues with Lotto win - The Irish Times
articles.description: Mayo town has now had four jackpot winners worth €80 million
articles.content:
Castlebars status as the luckiest town in Europe continues following the announcement that the largest ever Irish Lotto prize has been won there.

articles.title: EU faces threat of prolonged 'twindemic' as flu returns - CNA
articles.description:
BRUSSELS: Influenza has returned to Europe at a faster-than-expected rate this winter after almost disappearing last year, raising concerns about a prolonged "twindemic" with COVID-19 amid some doubts about the effectiveness of flu vaccines.
